tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE funding_sources (
    funding_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  funding_source_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (funding_source_id) REFERENCES funding_sources(funding_source_id)
);
CREATE TABLE funding_sources (  id INT PRIMARY KEY,  name VARCHAR(255),  type VARCHAR(50),  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) );
CREATE TABLE projects (  id INT PRIMARY KEY,  title VARCHAR(255),  start_date DATE,  end_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE project_funding (  project_id INT,  source_id INT,  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(id),  FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES funding_sources(id) );

CREATE TABLE project_funding (
  project_id INT,
  source_id INT,
  amount FLOAT,
 FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES funding_sources(id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_updates (
  update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
 update_date DATE,
 update_description TEXT,
 FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);
